extension.name: JD Featured Table
extension.author: JoomDev (Formerly GraphicAholic)
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2020 Joomdev, Inc. All rights reserved.
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
extension.description:
JD Featured Table

JD Featured Table is a Joomla module that lets you create responsive interactive price boxes for your services or products.

JD Featured Table formerly known as GA Featured Table from Graphicaholic is now moved to JoomDev along with other Extensions. Check out the Announcement here.

Support | Demo | More Details

field.name: NumberOfColumns
field.label: Number of Columns
field.description: Number of columns to display

field.name: columnSpacing
field.label: Space between columns
field.description: Enter a value to create open spacing between each coulmn.

field.name: bottomMargin
field.label: Bottom Margin
field.description: Enter a value to increase or decrease your bottom margin.

field.name: tooltipSize
field.label: Tooltip Box Width
field.description: Tooltip Box Width.

field.name: tooltipBackgroundColor
field.label: Tooltip Background Color
field.description: Click onto HEX value to bring-up the Colorpicker box

field.name: tooltipTextColor
field.label: Tooltip Text Color
field.description: Click onto HEX value to bring-up the Colorpicker box

field.name: ColumnOneLocation
field.label: Column 1 Ribbon Position
field.description: Column Ribbon Position

field.name: ColumnOneRibbon
field.label: Column 1 Ribbon Suffix
field.description: Enter Ribbon Class Suffix you wish to use. Leave blank for none.

field.name: ColumnTwoLocation
field.label: Column 2 Ribbon Position
field.description: Column Ribbon Position

field.name: ColumnTwoRibbon
field.label: Column 2 Ribbon Suffix
field.description: Enter Ribbon Class Suffix you wish to use. Leave blank for none.

field.name: ColumnSixRibbon

field.name: dropShadowEffect
field.label: Drow Shadow Effect
field.description: If a shadow effect is selected, it will show on all active columns.

field.name: useOverrides
field.label: Override Media Queries
field.description: Override Media Queries

field.name: oneColumnOverride
field.label: One Column Width
field.description: One coulum width override in percentage or fixed pixels.
